title: Ahar Cenotaphs
text: The Ahar Cenotaphs are a group of <a href="cenotaphs">cenotaphs</a> located in Ahar, Rajasthan, about 2 km east of <a href="Udaipur">Udaipur</a>, in <a href="Rajasthan">Rajasthan</a>, India. The site contains more than 250 cenotaphs of the <a href="Maharana">Maharanas</a> of <a href="Mewar">Mewar</a> that were built over approximately 350 years. There are 19 <a href="chhatri">chhatri</a>s that commemorate the 19 maharajas who were cremated here. The group of cenotaphs is also known as the Mahasati.
